group_1.narration: I can see a faint light…
Sometimes I wake up@caught between a dream and real life…
That must be what's happening again.
Yeah, I gotta get up early...@I need to train under Mama,@and help Rena take care of Slurpy,@the dog we adopted earlier...
And then...@Momoko'll teach me how to cook,@and then I'll get to go play@in the water with Kaede,@and then...
Oh, I never thought every day@could be so much fun…
I wanna get up.@I wanna wake up as soon as I can@so another happy day can start.
One of those wonderful days@I used to dream about…

group_1.textCenter: *Yaaawn…* It's morning.@Looks like I'm up early…

group_1.narration: I tried to lift my legs, but they didn't listen@and refused to move at all.
And not only my legs, either…@My arms… My neck…@Everything had frozen.
I tried to get up, but no matter what,@my body just wouldn't move at all.@All I could do was lay there.
I keep talking, unable to move,@but the world remains insanely quiet.@As if it's totally indifferent to me.
And yet, just past my doorway,@a beautiful dazzling light dances@and glitters before me…
Yes, I see…@If I can reach where the sun shines…@maybe someone will find me.
Maybe Mama will happen to pass by@and she'll help me…
I tried to move, even if I had to crawl,@to that place where the beautiful sun was shining.
